name: Oren
description: Oren comes from a long line of crafters.

name: Eryn
description: Eryn carefully chooses which materials to use.

name: Herbie
description: Herbie is a fledgling botanist in his spare time.

name: Lakur
description: Lakur is a skilled hunter and is proud to use her own products.

name: Tiny
description: Tiny is a hard-working student, hoping to learn all he can.

name: Crash
description: Crash relies on reputable traders for raw materials.

name: Titan
description: Titan often finds himself moderating disputes in the shop.

name: Smash
description: Smash has excellent attention to detail, and it shows.

name: Francis
description: Francis wants to be the very best, the best that ever was.

name: Squeaks
description: Squeaks is shy around new customers, but is very loyal.

name: Renae
description: Renae was taught by her mother to produce high quality goods.

name: Tawny
description: Tawny secretly moonlights as a dancer after business hours.

name: Gilbert
description: Gilbert is an excellent understudy with a bright future.

name: Gillian
description: Gillian has a underground black market supplier.

name: Gilfred
description: Gilfred hopes to become a designer one day.

name: Gilda
description: Gilda doesn't enjoy her job, but her bills get paid on time.
